mapper.select: SELECT tb1.USER_NM ,tb2.SEQ ,tb2.PAY_TYPE ,tb2.AMT ,tb2.AMT_RATE ,tb2.JOIN_TYPE ,tb2.CLASS_TYPE ,tb2.CLASS_NM ,tb2.CLASS_TIME ,tb2.ST_DATE ,tb2.ED_DATE ,tb2.JOIN_CNT ,tb2.COMPLE_CNT ,tb2.TERM ,tb2.INCOME ,tb2.ETC FROM MEM01MT tb1, MEM02MT tb2 WHERE tb1.USER_NO = tb2.USER_NO ORDER BY tb2.ST_DATE DESC
